name: Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, Stockholm

reviews.text: Be careful there are two Radisson hotels at Arlanda, one connected to the terminal and this one! About 10 minutes away on free shuttle bus, yellow bus number 14 outside the terminal. Got to the hotel and the free WiFi wasn't working, annoying if you need to do work. Was told it would be fixed soon, but stayed off all night, not a good start! Room was ok, just average, did notice it seemed quite small and tight trying to move round with cases. Pretty clean but some of the room furniture looked a bit tired. Bathroom was small too, wet room with the toilet almost in the shower! When I say wet room, I had a shower and the floor got flooded. The seal at the bottom of the shower screen didn't appear to do much and I ended up with a whole wetroom! Restaurant food and drink menu seemed very overpriced even for this part of the world. Wouldn't be my first choice if I had a choice.
reviews.title: Not the best Radisson experience

reviews.text: I spent a couple of nights at this hotel while in Stockholm on business - like most of the other guests, I suspect. The hotel is 5 minutes' ride on the #14 free shuttle bus, which runs every 15 minutes between the terminals, some of the hotels and car hire depots.
reviews.title: Convenient & comfortable

reviews.text: It is a good location for late arrivals and early departures, because Arlanda airport is a long way out of Stockholm - 20 minutes on the Arlanda Express train, and at SEK520 return, it isn't cheap, either! There are several buses to various locations in the Stockholm area, which are cheaper, but take a lot longer.
reviews.title: 24 hours in Stockholm

reviews.text: It is a large, corporate hotel, but pleasant enough. The staff were friendly & efficient, & the restaurant & bar quite acceptable. Breakfast is a typical, Scandinavian buffet providing both hot & cold dishes. I didn't have an evening meal there.
reviews.title: Air conditioner cannot be switched off
A bit overpriced for what you get...
reviews.text: My room was a single with wet-room shower - no bath: all spotlessly clean, and the bed was comfy with good quality cotton sheets, big pillows & duvet.

The rooms are small and a bit run down, but comfortable and clean. The most annoying thing is the bathroom; there is no shower cubical so you have to stand in bathtub when showering. The restaurant was very busy the night we stayed at the hotel, so we had to wait a long time to be served. The food and drink were alright, but overpriced. The breakfast buffet on the other hand is really good. You can find everything from smoked salmon to American pancakes. This is not a hotel I would like to stay in for a long period of time, but it is excellent for one night before an early flight.
reviews.title: If you have an early flight, this is the place to stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a free shuttle bus service from the hotel to Arlanda airport, and the ride takes about 5 minutes.
reviews.title: Nice for one night before early flight, great breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at the hotel in the late evening and were promptly checked in. Unfortunately, the room we were assigned had no power so we had to contact the front desk. The issue was resolved quickly and we were given an upgrade to a business class room on the same floor. Kudos to the staff for solving everything quickly!
reviews.title: Had Day Room Here; Glad We weren't spending the night!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was quite small but had everything we needed. There was even a Nespresso coffee machine. The bathroom was very nice and the amenities were better than we have seen at most hotels.
reviews.title: Practical, Comfortable, and Welcoming for the Right Price

reviews.text: The biggest plus of the hotel was the breakfast buffet which you can have as early as 4.30am. There was a wide selection of bread, jam, meats, salmon, cheese, juices, etc. A great way to start the day.
reviews.title: great for a stopover

reviews.text: Just for one night on a business trip at the hotel adjacent to the airport. Took shuttle bus no. 14 free of charge, the receptionist really friendly and helpfull , and all other staff without exception as well, clearly exceeding the usual airport hotels routine courtesy. Room was nice, much woodwork, with everything I appreciate in a hotel room such as smoking permitted, coffee machine of premium brand, ironing board, flat screen television with BBC news, window can be opened for fresh air, and the bed extremely comfortable, etc. Did not hear any noise from aircraft in spite of location. Had a snack at the bar-restaurant. Very friendly service. Quality of food good but a bit slow and french fries were luke warm. Breakfast also offered a great and good variety, although I missed mango juice and speciality cheese, but for a business more then perfect.
reviews.title: Convenient Location with hospitality

reviews.text: I used this hotel for my trip to Stockholm in Sweden with my family back in end of May to June 2011 and here is what I have to say:
reviews.title: No major complaints apart from one thing.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a quite convinient airport hotel with a free bus every 15 minutes, great breakfast both complimentary and cooked, friendly helpful staff like someone mentioned it is not a resort hotel so come on.
reviews.title: Good airport hotel

reviews.text: I actually wanted to stay with them or Clarion hotels in the City Centre but I thought it was either quite expensive or no Family room availiable so to make things cheaper and easier me and my sister along with my mum ended up selecting this one and booked two *twin* rooms 40km or 38miles away from the City center and everyday we travelled on the free bus to the Airport, then change at Marsta Station and get the train to Stockholm Central which I really miss to be honest.
reviews.title: Flying early? Arriving late? OK...

reviews.text: I personally don't feel it was too expencive with free internet conection, breakfast, swimming pool, sauna and gym.
reviews.title: Reasonable hotel but bit overpriced

reviews.text: You get to and from the hotel by using the free airportshuttle (Alfa). The bus departs from bus stop number 14 at every terminal. Very friendly staff and nice breakfast! Free wireless internet and a coffeemaker in the room. Wheelchair friendly!
reviews.title: Nice hotel for a reasonable price at ARN

reviews.text: I was disappointed about Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel:
reviews.title: Bad service, unfriendly staff, very expensive

reviews.text: I paid about 230 Euro for one night in a business class room in this hotel (cause there where no free "normal" rooms). The only difference to the normal room I could find was the Nespresso machine in the room. Its not worth to upgrade to business class.
reviews.title: Comfortable but overpriced

reviews.text: Internet was very slow and VOIP calls where not possible.
reviews.title: Convenient for one night layover

reviews.text: They call their parking "Guest Parking". But have to pay 15 Euro per night. So in my opinion its not a guest parking, if i have to pay. Its more like a public parking.
reviews.title: Its a layover hotel

aka: Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, Stockholm Hotel
description: A four-star hotel with 338 sound proofed rooms, just 4 minutes from the airport with a free shuttle bus every 15 minutes. The hotel has an onsite car park and free high-speed Internet access for all guests. All room is featured with with minibar, TV and free coffee/tea making facilities in the room. The Super Breakfast Buffet in Restaurant Cayenne opens at 04:30 each morning. Featuring warm and stylish South American décor, Restaurant Cayenne serves well-prepared dishes from around the world with a touch of local flavors. In the bar you can enjoy a freshly brewed cup of coffee or a cocktail paired with the perfect snack from the bar menu. All guests have free entrance to a well-equipped relaxation area with swimming pool, sauna, solarium and fitness room. The hotel is certified by the Nordic Ecolabel (Svanen) and has a Climate Neutral Certification. Stockholm City is only 20 minutes from the airport with express train
